attributes.title: I would not recommend

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with Trump 2020 campaign. When I opened the app it was SUPER glitchy and slow, app was very confusing to navigate. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
